faults.symptoms: Rattling noise on cold start, check engine light
faults.verdictImplication: Critical: Verify if TSB 21-2119 has been performed. If not, deduct $3,500 from valuation.
Moderate: Software updates may fix it, but hardware failure requires rebuild.
High Risk: If unchecked, destroys entire transmission ($5k).
Severe: Requires head removal. Avoid high mileage units without proof of repair.

faults.symptoms: Sagging rear end, compressor running constantly
faults.verdictImplication: Common: Plan for conversion to coil springs ($1,500) eventually.

faults.symptoms: Ticking noise on cold start (The 'Hemi Tick')
faults.verdictImplication: Annoyance: Often broken bolts. Inspect carefully before buying.
Critical: The 'Jatco CVT' is a known weak point. High failure rate over 80k miles.
Critical: Verify if CVT cooler was installed or warranty extended.

faults.symptoms: Grinding noise on cold start (1-2 seconds)
faults.verdictImplication: Moderate: Common on 2.4L engines. Annoying but manageable if fixed early.

faults.symptoms: Gasoline smell in oil, rising oil level
faults.verdictImplication: Watch: Mainly affects 2017+ 1.5L Turbo. Ensure software update is applied.
Moderate: Software update might fix, otherwise costly torque converter replacement.
Critical: Subaru extended warranty to 100k miles. Verify coverage status.
Severe: May require short block replacement. Check service history for consumption test.
Classic issue still present. Check for coolant leaks externally.
Critical: Pump is inside the engine. If it fails, it can destroy the engine immediately.
High: 'Lifetime' fluid cooks itself. Frequent fluid changes needed to prevent failure.

faults.symptoms: Rattling noise, low oil, engine stall
faults.verdictImplication: Critical: 2.4L engine consumes oil, leading to timing chain stretch and engine blow-up.

faults.symptoms: Vehicle sinks overnight, service suspension message
faults.verdictImplication: Common: Expensive to fix properly. Many convert to standard springs.

faults.symptoms: Fuel pump relay failure, stalling, no-start
faults.verdictImplication: Moderate: External relay partial fix exists, but TIPM replacement is proper fix.
Critical: Verify knock sensor update (KSDS). Free engine replacement possible if qualified.

faults.symptoms: Rod knock, metallic debris in oil
faults.verdictImplication: Critical: Same as Hyundai. Lifetime warranty extension exists for some, but strict requirements.

faults.symptoms: Violent shaking of steering wheel after a bump
faults.verdictImplication: Famed Issue: Usually track bar or ball joints. Fixable but scary.

faults.symptoms: Oil leak in valley of engine
faults.verdictImplication: Common: Plastic part cracks. Upgrade to aluminum aftermarket part recommended.
Critical: Avoid earlier years (2013-2015) if possible, or verify transmission replacement.
Annoyance: Mostly software/tuning issue. TSB updates available.
Critical: Inspect frame thoroughly. Toyota had a replacement program.
Common: Known defect with extended warranty on some parts (condenser), but compressor is pricey.
